frames.title: S001. About Palco Power Systems and Scott Electric and a Welcome to Training

choices.label: Go to Palco Power Systems

frames.narr1: Slide S001. About Palco Power Systems and Scott Electric and a Welcome to Training   About Palco Power Systems and Scott Electric and a Welcome to Training.
frames.narr2: Palco Power Systems is a specialized power solutions provider and an authorized KOHLER distributor, serving customers across western Pennsylvania, West Virginia, and western Maryland. Since 1972, Palco has supplied reliable generator systems and power equipment to industrial, commercial, municipal, healthcare, and residential customers who depend on uninterrupted power
frames.narr3:
Palco Power Systems is a specialized power solutions provider and an authorized KOHLER distributor, serving customers across western Pennsylvania, West Virginia, and western Maryland. Since 1972, Palco has supplied reliable generator systems and power equipment to industrial, commercial, municipal, healthcare, and residential customers who depend on uninterrupted power.
As part of the Scott Electric family since 1993, Palco Power Systems combines deep technical expertise with the broader resources of a leading independent electrical distributor. Our portfolio includes KOHLER industrial, mobile (towable), residential, and portable generator systems; pumps; other power systems and components; Honda portable units; transfer equipment; and related accessories, including ASCO and PSP components.
Over the years, Palco’s territory and responsibilities have grown along with its reputation:• 1972 – Palco becomes an authorized KOHLER distributor in western Pennsylvania.• 1984 – Territory expands to include West Virginia and western Maryland.• 1989 – Area of responsibility further expands to include western New York State.• 1993 – Scott Electric Company acquires Palco.• 2001 – Territory is adjusted with the removal of western New York State.
Most recently, Palco Power Systems was the first Scott Electric division to host a Conference Room Pilot (CRP) for the new Infor CloudSuite software, demonstrating leadership and innovation in how we use technology to support customers and internal operations.

frames.title: M1. Rental SOP - PPS Service Rental

choices.label: Go to Customer Places an order for a Rental Unit

frames.narr1: Slide M1. Rental SOP   Rental SOP.
frames.narr2: This process cover the steps taken to satisfy the a customer wanting to rent a genertor from us. It starts from the receipt of a request from the customer, understanding their needs and identifying a suitable unit writing up a contract, ensure that the rental would be covered by insurance while at the renter's possesion and finally process the return and final bill
frames.narr3: This process cover the steps taken to satisfy the a customer wanting to rent a genertor from us. It starts from the receipt of a request from the customer, understanding their needs and identifying a suitable unit writing up a contract, ensure that the rental would be covered by insurance while at the renter's possesion and finally process the return and final bill. I also takes into account the process to procure a rental unit from another Rentor to satisfy the customer needs especially when we do not have one that meets the specs or availbility requested.
